caption:
“From ruin rises revelation.”

Reflection:
When the temple crumbles, light enters through the cracks. Out of loss, divine wisdom is born.

Commentary:
This reflection reminds us that endings are not empty — God speaks through collapse, revealing purpose beneath pain.
